person_analysis.overview: Artem Alekhin is the Co-Founder & CTO of Voiceform, an AI-powered voice and video survey company transforming qualitative research and customer engagement. With experience as a software engineer at Super.com and previous startup co-founder (HabFit), Artem combines strong full-stack engineering expertise with entrepreneurial leadership. His journey has been shaped by participation in accelerators like UC Berkeley Skydeck and ICUBE UTM, and his current work at Voiceform highlights his focus on integrating AI into accessible, intuitive research tools.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Artem Alekhin is a Canadian entrepreneur and technologist, currently serving as Co-Founder and CTO of Voiceform. He has extensive experience in full-stack development and startup building, with previous roles at Super.com and early ventures like HabFit. Today, he is leading Voiceform’s product and technical growth, focusing on AI-driven feedback and survey technologies.
key_insights: Strong blend of technical expertise and startup leadership, transitioning from developer roles to co-founder.
Leads innovation in AI-powered survey research, integrating voice, video, and probing AI features.
Actively engaged in startup accelerators, expanding professional network and growth trajectory.
Multilingual (English and Russian), strengthening cross-cultural collaboration capabilities.
